title: "Next" button in Cloud > Graph view doesn't work (new web UI)
description:
When you click the "Next" button at the bottom of the Cloud > Graph view of the new web UI (to display the next 20 collections when you have more than 20 on your cluster) an empty error box appears at the top of the page and the page keeps displaying the first 20 collections.

Workarounds:

	display all collections by increasing the number of collections per page
	switch to the old web UI



Tested with Firefox, Opera, and Chromium.
